title: Pizza
data:
{{obsolete}} {{item |itemtype=Comestible |name=Pizza |cost=? |weight=4.0 }} {{flavour|A slice of pizza: a flatbread with tomato sauce, mozzarella di bufala, and basil.

"When the moon hits your eye like a big pizza pie, that's amore."
-Jack Brooks, "That's Amore"}} '''Pizza''' is a [[food]] found in the dungeon which provides 1,500 [[nutrition]] and can be eaten by any [[species]] at any level of satiety except engorged. There are many different kinds of pizza hidden throughout the dungeon, but the difference is purely cosmetic. Pizza takes 20 aut to eat. ==Toppings== *Chicken. *Ham and pineapple. *Pepperoni. *Super Supreme. *Camembert. *Cheesy. *That's the fabled [[Pandemonium]] Pizza! *Mushroom. *Peppers. *Vegetable. *Anchovies. The above topping names are preceded by either "Mmm..." or "Yeuchh!", depending on what your species can normally eat. [[Carnivore]]s like ham and pineapple through Pandemonium, while [[herbivore]]s like Camembert through vegetable. Everyone hates anchovies. ==History== Pizza was removed in [[0.20]].
